data.actual_result: You see the "No text channels" screen on the friend's list
data.short_description: Deleting a server on another device while closing discord with that server open shows no text channels
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a server - Make sure to connect to a voice channel on another device due to the current voice channel crashing bug - Make sure that your phone is on the server you made, and completely close Discord - Delete the server from another device - Reopen Discord on your phone and observe the screen that comes up
